name: Convergent Media Systems
overview: Convergent Media Systems Corporation designs, installs, operates, and maintains media distribution networks for business television, interactive distance learning, and out-of-home advertising. The company offers solutions, such as Networked digital signage, which enables retailers and brand marketers to use messages to target the audience; Interactive Distance Learning that delivers live and on-demand video; and corporate communication solutions. Its services also include managed services, such as project management and installation; content creation; and operations and support. The company was formerly known as EDS Video Services and changed its name to Convergent Media Systems Corporation in 1992. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Alpharetta, Georgia. Convergent Media Systems Corporation is a subsidiary of Technicolor Network Services.

acquisition.source_description: Sony Electronics Acquires Convergent Media Systems
